imdb.title: Big Order
imdb.plot: Ten years ago, a child wished for the destruction of the world. Now, a group of people has the ability to grant their wishes depending on their power. They are called "Order User. Before these great people who have the power of "O...

episodes.title: Order! Awaken, Evil Powers! Big Destruction
episodes.plot: If you could have any wish granted, what would you wish for? Ten years ago, when Hoshimiya Eiji encountered a mysterious being, his wish was granted, bringing about world destruction. Ever since then, he's kept his powers as an Order a secret, living an ordinary life in the aftermath, devoted to his ill sister, Sena. One day, his class gets a transfer student that finally draws his eye, Kurenai Rin. Yet once they're alone together, she tries to kill Eiji for what he did ten years ago, forcing his story into motion. But what is the true identity of his power that ...

episodes.title: Order! Run, Don't Hesitate! Big Examination
episodes.plot: After Eiji dominates Kurenai Rin, a new Order appears, and they're both taken captive along with Sena! While Rin repeatedly fails to kill Eiji during their escape, Eiji sets out to rescue his sister--and a new group of Orders appears!

episodes.title: Order! Protect Your Beliefs! Big Belief
episodes.plot: While Eiji is at a loss for options, Hiiragi orders him to withdraw to Dazaifu. When Eiji refuses to accept it, Hiiragi corners him. But then DAISY appears, connecting a line to Rin.

episodes.title: Order! Hurry to the Battlefield! Big Battle
episodes.plot: UNIGM Public Safety Division Vice Director, Gennai makes his move. Franc kidnaps Sena from Dazaifu and tries to trade her for a deal with Gennai. Meanwhile, Hiiragi predicts that Gennai's objective is to cause another Great Destruction!

episodes.title: Order! Uncover the Truth! Big Revelation
episodes.plot: Hoshimiya Gennai enters his facility in Heijoukyou, Nara to finally open the Gate to the other world. Hiiragi and Dazaifu's Group of Ten surround the facility and commence their attack in order to put a stop to Gennai's scheme.

episodes.title: Order! Fight and Believe in Yourself! Big Distortion
episodes.plot: Hoshimiya Eiji is told the truth--The Great Destruction was caused by his sister, Sena, and to protect her, he stole her powers and rewrote her memories. With Sena helping him, Gennai begins to open the Gate.
